title: We’re looking for an experienced Google Ads & Meta Ads Account Manager (Remote) to manage performance-driven campaigns.
job_overview:
We’re looking for an experienced Google Ads & Meta Ads Account Manager (Remote) to manage performance-driven campaigns.
Send your CV: Upgrade to see actual info

Salary: $3000 - $5000/month depending on skills

Duties:

Manage Google and Meta Ads campaigns daily.

Optimize strategies to achieve KPIs.

Analyze data to improve future performance.

Requirements:

1+ year proven experience in performance marketing.

Data-driven mindset.

Ability to work remotely.
